data.text: Of course Trump’s judicial nominee is a product of the Koch/Leo Operation – and of course she’s not concerned about conflicts of interest. https://t.co/yiP4zH03Iq
Fewer eyes on Trump corruption, fewer eyes on Putin aggression. Bezos knows the way to Trump’s heart. https://t.co/3XWCGgjzfl

When King George tried to bully Boston into paying unfair taxes, it did not go well for him. Trump trying to bully Boston’s Harvard University steps into that history. Stand strong, northern neighbor!  
https://t.co/mHj3Ud0VtK

A White House spokesman is free to lie that “offshore wind is the most expensive source of energy,” but in court when the states asserted huge consumer savings, the administration was conspicuously quiet. There are consequences for lying in court.
Low-cost wind would displace high-cost fossil, so by delaying it and raising your rates, they steer money to Trump’s big fossil fuel donors. Payback to cronies, with your dollars.

Offshore wind would make our grid more reliable in the winter, and reduce costs. Trumpsters lie about that to cover up the scam they’re running. 
https://t.co/tHhOwef6C3
If Senator Cruz was actually interested in rooting out fraud, this is where he’d start. https://t.co/uyrUiyh5FP

On the other hand, Trump is smiling, and that gives motive to this destruction.

It’s not lack of funds for Bezos, whose wealth is estimated north of $215 billion.
https://t.co/Oul5ACB6zn

Ukraine knows something about Russian intelligence operations too.
https://t.co/qXjKApbtTd https://t.co/zPQ1St2Mtz
We need to get this right. The economic benefits from eliminating carbon pollution are huge. https://t.co/GjPlXaUywT
